page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: List of Farmhouses on the O.S.Survey Map. Wharton Rudge Little Wharton Rock Pound Norton Castle End Moors Lyndors Bradley Bradley Court Bilbut Laine's Cornage Upper Coldridge Dean Common Chessgrove Lea Bailey Preece Moor - Some of these farmhouses have reverted to ordinary private household usuage and no longer have connections with the farmland around them.The local farmers have purchased these farms when they became available and with little or any increase in numbers of farm employees formerly employed by them, have made the larger units more economically.This has resulted in a depopulation in the rural areas for they tend to seek work in other parts of the country in any trade for the local factories are reducing their own numbers of staff.
